participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and creative, always dreaming big and striving for success in her acting career.
participant_1.background: I spend my weekends reading fantasy novels and watching Game of Thrones. I'm still living with my parents while I save up for my own place. I want to learn how to train my dog to behave in a new country. I m an actress and i work at a grocery store. i think i ll be famous one day.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and easygoing, enjoys a simple life surrounded by nature and family.
participant_2.background: I am not really concerned with my appearance, as I spend most of my time on the farm. I remember playing with my cat in the backyard all day long. i love living in texas. I start working with my brother in law in Hollywood. i work in a circus as a juggler.

content.text: Hey, what do you do for fun?
I love animals, so I work as a juggler in a circus.
Oh that's cool, I really like animals too. I used to spend all day playing with my cat.
I'm from Texas, so I've been around a lot of animals.
I live in California, but I've always wanted to move to Texas.
You should come visit! We have a ton of fun stuff to do here.
I will definitely have to check it out sometime.
I'm sure you'd love it. I'm actually moving to Hollywood to work with my brother in law.
That's so cool! I'm an actress, so I'm always looking for new opportunities.
Maybe we can work together sometime!
I'm sure we can make it happen.
